ARABIC: مَّا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No nation can advance its appointed time nor can they delay it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: No people can hasten or delay the term already fixed for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: No people can outstrip the term for its destruction nor can it delay it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Every nation can only live for the time appointed for it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: No group may advance its appointed promise nor postpone it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: No nation can advance its term, nor delay it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: No people can hasten on their doom nor can they postpone (it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and no nation outstrips its term, nor do they put it back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: No nation can outstrip its term nor can they lag behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: no people can forestall their doom, nor can they delay it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: No community precedeth the term thereof nor doth it fall behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: No nation can advance its time nor can it defer it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Neither can a people anticipate its term, nor delay it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: No nation can anticipate its term, nor delay it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No nation can outstrip its term, nor do they put it back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: No nation can bring its time forward, nor can they delay it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:5] No community (min ummatin: min is extra) can outstrip its [predetermined] term nor can they [seek to] delay it, [nor can they] put it off.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (No nation can outstrip its term) He says: no nation perishes or is destroyed before the appointed time for its perishing or destruction (nor can they lag behind) no nation is given respite when its appointed time comes.
